meanings.definition: The act of applying a decorative chromium finish to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The chroming of the car's bumpers made them shiny and reflective.
meanings.sent2: I watched the chroming process at the auto shop as they coated the metal with a gleaming finish.
meanings.sent3: The chroming of the bicycle wheels turned them into mirrors on wheels!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the chroming of a dull day, brightening everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The chroming on the faucet sparkled like a thousand tiny stars.

meanings.definition: The process of using a web browser to access and view content on the internet.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy chroming on my computer to read news articles and watch videos.
meanings.sent2: Chroming has become a daily routine for many people to stay informed and entertained.
meanings.sent3: He spent hours chroming on his laptop, lost in the world of online information.
meanings.sent4: In today's digital age, chroming has revolutionized how we gather information.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of chroming allows us to explore a vast virtual world with a click.
